name: Princess Makeover - Beauty Tips and Modern Fashion Make-up Game
name_original: Princess Makeover - Beauty Tips and Modern Fashion Make-up Game
description:
Meet you new Princess, make her up and hot, make her look loveliest and awesome, Try new hot dresses, change her eyes, change her glasses, put awesome necklace around her neck, grab a beautiful lipstick for her and make your princess number one in world!!

Do you love to take care of your princess ? Do you want to be a princess? Don’t worry! Our magical beauty salon will help you to be a princess. You will be able to use the magic of Princess Makeover.
It’s super easy to play this game. Need just tapping and dragging. Open the game in your device. In the home screen you need to tap on the play button. Then you will see several PRINCESS characters in the screen. You can choose any of the princess’s superstar life.
Now, you have the access to your MAGICAL BEAUTY PARLOR! Use different stuffs in the prom salon to take care of your princess. Don’t forget to use shower to clean your princess! Remember there is no sports girl glam fever, only the beautiful princess!

-Exciting PRINCESS MAKEOVER Game Features:
-Easy to control
-Intuitive interface
-HD graphics
-Realistic sounds
-Unlimited playing
-Three different princess characters
- Several tools to play with your princess



Remember! This is addictive; too much addictive! Be aware before play!!! Kids as well as the adults will be playing this addictive game for hours!

Don't be late! Download the princess makeup game right now! It allows both dress up and make up features to play with!
Download now! Get this makeover games for free! Have fun! Let’s take care of your princess!
